product.longDescription: Stems are purple; leaves are flat and toothed with purple veins. Mature plants are medium-tall and leaves are tender compared to other kales. For salads and light cooking. Unsized seed. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 142,400 seeds/lb. Packet: 100 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Smooth, green, purple-veined leaves for baby leaf and bunching.
